title: What is the Roland Garros tennis schedule?
description: Roland Garros continues on Monday in Paris, where top seed Jannik Sinner will begin his campaign against Frenchman Arthur Rinderknech in the final night-session match on Court Philippe-Chatrier. Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz will face Giulio Zeppieri in the second match on Court Suzanne-Lenglen. Taylor Fritz, Casper Ruud, Holger Rune and Arthur Fils are also in action on the second day of the tournament. View the full order of play for Monday here and see featured matches below... Court Philippe-Chatrier From 12 p.m. Rebecca Sramkova vs. [5] Iga Swiatek Naomi Osaka vs. [10] Paula Badosa [WC] Terence Atmane vs Richard Gasquet Night Session  Not before 8:15 p.m. [1] Jannik Sinner vs. Arthur Rinderknech Court Suzanne-Lenglen From 11 a.m. Jessica Bouzas Maneiro vs. [9] Emma Navarro Giulio Zeppieri vs. [2] Carlos Alcaraz Caro Garcia vs. Bernarda Pera Nicolas Jarry vs. [14] Arthur Fils View Full Order Of Play Here [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Roland Garros continues on Monday with Jannik Sinner, Carlos Alcaraz, Taylor Fritz and more in action. Find out the Monday order of play here.

Roland Garros

Sinner, Alcaraz, Fritz in action on Monday

May 25, 2025

Dimitar Dilkoff/AFP via Getty Images

Roland Garros runs from 25 May-8 June. By ATP Staff

Roland Garros continues on Monday in Paris, where top seed Jannik Sinner will begin his campaign against Frenchman Arthur Rinderknech in the final night-session match on Court Philippe-Chatrier. Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz will face Giulio Zeppieri in the second match on Court Suzanne-Lenglen. Taylor Fritz, Casper Ruud, Holger Rune and Arthur Fils are also in action on the second day of the tournament.

View the full order of play for Monday here and see featured matches below...

Court Philippe-Chatrier
From 12 p.m.
Rebecca Sramkova vs. [5] Iga Swiatek
Naomi Osaka vs. [10] Paula Badosa
[WC] Terence Atmane vs Richard Gasquet

Night Session 
Not before 8:15 p.m.
[1] Jannik Sinner vs. Arthur Rinderknech

Court Suzanne-Lenglen
From 11 a.m.
Jessica Bouzas Maneiro vs. [9] Emma Navarro
Giulio Zeppieri vs. [2] Carlos Alcaraz
Caro Garcia vs. Bernarda Pera
Nicolas Jarry vs. [14] Arthur Fils

View Full Order Of Play Here
